fields.label: Message
fields.message: This is the default WordPress post template. This is used for blog posts and/or news articles you would like to share.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: This is the default WordPress template. If you are trying to use the content blocks, change the page template to Page in the Page Attributes box on the sidebar.

fields.label: Custom Page Title
fields.name: custom_page_title
fields.instructions: Would you like to add a custom page title to the header?

fields.label: Page Title
fields.name: page_title
fields.instructions: If you would like a custom page title, write in a title here. If you leave this field blank, the page will default to the WordPress Page Title.

fields.label: Header Image Overlay Opacity
fields.name: header_image_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: If necessary, use this slider to add a dark overlay to your background image.

fields.label: Header Image Height
fields.name: header_height
fields.instructions: Set the height of the header.

fields.label: Header Button
fields.name: header_button
fields.instructions: Would you like to add a button(s) to the header?

fields.label: Phone Number
fields.name: phone_number
fields.instructions: Your primary phone number, formatted as: 800-637-6622

sub_fields.label: Content Width
sub_fields.name: text_box_width
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a width for the text block. The default width is half-width.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: list_block_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The default background color is white.

sub_fields.label: Content Width
sub_fields.name: video_block_width
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a width for the text block. The default width is half-width.

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video_block_url
sub_fields.instructions: Paste in the .MP4 URL here. You can find the full URL in the media library.

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: The video poster image will be displayed before the user plays the video. The image will also be used as a fallback for browsers who don't support video.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: box_block_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The default background color is blue.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: call_to_action_block_bg_image
sub_fields.instructions: If you do not select a file to be used as a background image, the Call to Action block will have a white background.

sub_fields.label: Background Image Overlay Opacity
sub_fields.name: call_to_action_block_bg_image_overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: If necessary, use this slider to add a dark overlay to your background image.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: tab_block_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The default background color is white.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: team_block_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The default background color is blue.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: faq_block_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The default background color is white.

sub_fields.label: Contact Form
sub_fields.message: If you use the Contact Block the Contact Form will automatically be included. If you need to edit the fields of the contact form, navigate to the Forms link in the sidebar.

sub_fields.label: Spacer
sub_fields.message: If you choose this block, a preset spacer will be added to the page.
